main event: Two civilian observers reported seeing a luminous object in the sky that resembled an aluminum disc with black wings on July 3rd, 1953, in Middletown, New York.
interesting points: The object appeared at a distance of 3 to 5 miles and was described as reflecting sunlight when banking,The observers noted that the object lasted for 1-2 minutes in sight, and they thought it resembled a full-sized aircraft,No noise or pollution was associated with the object,The observers did not find any photographs, sketches or detailed diagrams to illustrate their sighting.
sighted object: luminous object resembling an aluminum disc with black wings
